description: A multiplier that automatically converts your CN stock price into the local-warehouse price. It ensures your local inventory prices reflect regional costs, currency factors, and margin targets.

parameters.name: partner_id
parameters.description: Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful. Required for all requests.

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes.

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: The token for API access, using to identify your permission to the api. Valid for multiple use and expires in 4 hours

parameters.name: merchant_id
parameters.description: Shoppe's unique identifier for a merchant. Required for all merchant level requests(CB ONDC user calling global product related APIs)

parameters.name: sign
parameters.description: String generated by concatenating all params (excluding: timestamp, access_token, merchant_id and partner_id) via SHA256 hashing algorithm.

parameters.name: adjustment_rate
parameters.description: The multiplier used to adjust the cross-border original price to local price

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the shop to which the adjustment rate applies

response_fields.name: error
response_fields.description: The multiplier used to adjust the cross-border original price to local price

response_fields.name: message
response_fields.description: Indicate error details if an error. Empty if no error happened

response_fields.name: warning
response_fields.description: Indicate warning details if hit warning. Empty if no warning happened

response_fields.name: request_id
response_fields.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking

error_codes.description: The information you queried is not found

notes: The documentation includes multiple URLs for different regions (Global, Chinese Mainland, Brazil) but the core endpoint structure remains the same. API permissions section is visible but details are not fully shown in the image.
